articles.description: The sixth installment in the Jurassic Park franchise has earned a total $623.4M globally despite dismal reviews from critics
articles.content:
Universal Pictures' Jurassic World Dominion dominated the box office over Father's Day weekend by earning $58.6M domestically out of 4,697 US theaters.
